CustomField.description: SOQL Query to run to select objects based on the cartId (for eg: Line Items) to process. This is required to if your Handler class is implementing Batchable.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: SOQL Query to run to select objects based on the cartId (for eg: Line Items) to process. This is required to if your Handler class is implementing Batchable. eg: SELECT Id, Apttus_Config2__PrimaryLineNumber__c FROM Apttus_Config2__LineItem__c WHERE Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__c = :cartId
CustomField.label: Soql Query
